suppress.notes: file name: camunda-engine-7.15.0.jar (shaded: com.google.code.gson:gson:2.8.5) camunda-rest-client-spring-boot-starter still uses old camunda engine with vulnerability
latest Log4j api 2.17.2 still got vulnerabilities
snakeyaml-1.28.jar vulnerability coming through the launchdarkly-java-server-sdk-5.9.0.jar
CVE-2016-1000027 cant be fixed since spring has conveyed its a known warning in their documentation details are available to it from here https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-1000027
Upgrading to tomcat embed core to 1.10.x has got startup issues which requires investigation
file name: jakarta.annotation-api-1.3.5.jar stable version of org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-web -> 2.5.14 contains this vulnerability
